import { FilePickerImage } from "/src/components/Images";


# File Picker
Toggles allow user to turn an option on or off.

<div style={{backgroundColor: 'white', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
   <FilePickerImage />
</div>

```xml
<GridLayout
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:columnCount="3"
    android:rowCount="2"
    android:useDefaultMargins="true">

    <com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.FilePickerMV
        android:id="@+id/fpEmpty"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="128dp"
        android:layout_columnWeight="1" />

    <com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.FilePickerMV
        android:id="@+id/fpUploadedPdf"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="128dp"
        android:layout_columnWeight="1" />

    <com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.FilePickerMV
        android:id="@+id/fpUploadedZip"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="128dp"
        android:layout_columnWeight="1" />

    <com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.FilePickerMV
        android:id="@+id/fpUploadedImg"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_columnWeight="1" />

    <com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.FilePickerMV
        android:id="@+id/fpViewUploadedPdf"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="128dp"
        android:layout_columnWeight="1"
        app:isViewOnly="true" />

    <com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.FilePickerMV
        android:id="@+id/fpViewUploadedZip"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="128dp"
        android:layout_columnWeight="1"
        app:isViewOnly="true" />

    <com.waresix.lib.ui.component.molecule.FilePickerMV
        android:id="@+id/fpViewUploadedImg"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_columnWeight="1"
        app:isViewOnly="true" />

</GridLayout>
```
`app:isViewOnly="true"` is used for remove delete button on the top right of view.

you can set thumbnail by extension (currently only support pdf and zip) by using code below

```kotlin
fpViewUploadedPdf.fileExtension = "pdf"
fpViewUploadedZip.fileExtension = "zip"
```

or you can set thumbnail using image from internet using glide, you just need to set file url like below

```kotlin
fpUploadedImg.fileUrl = "https://dummyimage.com/150.png/ccc/000"
fpViewUploadedImg.fileUrl = "https://dummyimage.com/150.png/ccc/000"
```

Then you can set action on delete icon is clicked
```kotlin
fpUploadedPdf.onClickRemove { 
    //TODO: YOUR ACTION HERE TO DELETE THE IMAGE 
}
```
also can set action on file clicked if the file is not empty
```kotlin
fpUploadedPdf.onClickFile { 
    //TODO: YOUR ACTION HERE TO VIEW THE IMAGE 
}
```
and last you can also set action on file clicked if the file is empty (to add image or file)
```kotlin
fpUploadedPdf.onClickAdd { 
    //TODO: YOUR ACTION HERE TO ADD FILE 
}
```
